评论概述: BEWARE, DO NOT PURCHASE FROM SELLER!!!
评论详情: Do not buy anything from this clothing store, I ordered some Techwear Pants, I am about 260lbs and I have only worn them 2 times, on the 1st wash on my washing machine, everything started to come apart, the thread ripped off and now you can see inside to your underwear, smh.... if I could only get my refund back, I would give them Zero Stars....
These are so dope! Bought a medium for how I wanna wear them - but they’re super comfy.

评论概述: Looks nice but falls apart easily
评论详情: The design is nice but the threads holding it together rip easily even when it's the right size. Beyond the seems ripping the vinyl designs on the pants starts coming off after the first wash and feels like it can't adhere to the pants fabric itself. You'll need to sew the green strap on the left leg so it stops coming undone from the buckle it's on.  Other than these issues at least the pants look nice if you know how to repare it
Some of the best quality I have gotten and very comfortable.

评论概述: Perfect fit and exactly what I was looking for!
评论详情: I finally found my dream pants and was worried about the size and yet when they arrived (a lot faster than expected) they were a perfect fit and exactly what I wanted!

The pants look amazing and are very comfortable, but they do not have back pockets. You have the two on your sides, and one on the front of your left thigh. I don't like the left thigh pocket because I am afraid my wallet will fall out of it when I am out and about.

So I bought these a few months ago and absolutely love them great style and work well with a lot of my shoes and shirts that I have, however I do wish they had the orange ones that they advertise in a few of the pictures please if anyone knows where I can get a pair of the orange ones I would really appreciate it other then that great amazing fit and style.

I ordered the recommended size and it fits just fine but the waist elastic is a bit tight. Not in a "you'll need to size up" kinda way, but in a "you'll need to break these in a bit" kind of way. Really like em, matches my flannel real well.
